content.description: Climb pocked face to a splitter crack. Fun climbing, but pretty poor rock quality. Be careful. This is probably the easiest route to rap in on, to climb the four climbs in this area.
content.location: Located 20’ to the left of Creature Feature.

content.description: Fun pocket pulling with a crux down low and another higher up.
content.location: The center route on the Tomo (Center) Wall, just right of  'Fun Monkey' (aka 'Pride and Joy').

content.description:
Don’t let the name fool you, this climb is nothing like any of the other climbs in this area.

Climb the steep start, to a tricky slab to the top of the boulder.
content.location: Located down the hill 100 feet, from Furious Fingers, on a large boulder.

content.description: Climb the face in the back of a corridor.
content.location: Left around the corner from Start Me Up. Look for long chains hanging over the top for the anchor.

content.description: Follow the slab the a little lip/steeper section (crux) then flake and face to anchor.  A fun route with a technical crux.
content.location: The face route immediately left of 'Little Girl Suck.'

content.description: Cool face to a slab. The use of the left arete is helpful.
content.protection: 5 bolts to bolted anchor, with no quick links.
content.location: The farthest down river climb.

content.description:
Climb the slab using pockets, edges and slopers.

USE STICK CLIP FOR FIRST BOLT. The base area is very loose, and would be easy to slip off of.
content.protection: 5 bolts to bolted anchor with leaver carabiners
content.location: Located just up stream from Krusty’s Korner. To get to the base of this climb you have to walk in from the top of the cliff. The trail down is about 50’ upstream from the climb. Look for a large cairn and follow a few more to the base of the climb. Easy scramble.

content.description: Fun pocket pulling that gets a little thinner higher up.
content.location: The right hand route of the Tomo (Center) Wall.

content.description: Fun, low angle face climbing on small pockets/features.
content.protection: 7 bolts, glue-in ring anchor (asca anchor replacement, please do not TR/lower through this anchor directly!)
content.location: The shallow, black water groove one encounters on the first cliff SE of the approach.  See topo overview picture on main Rimview page for exact location.

content.description: Climb the left side of the arete, to a blocky middle section and then a pocketed face.
content.location: Ten feet to the right of Little Girl Suck

content.description: Fun pocket and knob climbing to a small ledge, then continue straight up past two bolts (the crux if easier ground on the left is avoided) to easier climbing and another bolt.
content.location: Toward the center-left side of the cliff (see overview pic), just below a large leaning tree

climbs.name: Raging Raphe
climbs.fa: Matt Thomsen, Stu Kuperstock, Rusty Phillips

content.description: Fun crimps and pockets. Easier if you move right at the top.
content.location: Shiny bolts on face.

content.description: Climb the very pocketed slab.
content.protection: Bolts to bolted anchor with quick links.
content.location: Located 30 feet right of Tuft de.

climbs.name: Pro Choice
climbs.fa: Jim Mcc, Bill Mcc, Jon Mcc, Frank Baker, Feb. 26, 2016

content.description: Climb very pocketed face to a small roof/overlap, pull roof and climb slab to the top.
content.location: 20’ to the right of Will Power.

climbs.name: Little Girl Suck
climbs.fa: Matt and Jacinda Thomsen, Stu Kuperstock

content.description: Fun corner with a crux at the little roof.  Easier if you go out on the right face at that point, harder if you try to stay in the corner.
content.location: Bolted corner between 'Jacinda's Day Off' and 'Pride and Joy' see topo pic on main Rimview page for exact location.

content.description:
Climb on or just right of the arete. Crux is in the first two bolts. Move right at the top to finish up the anchors for

Start Me Up

.
content.location:
Climb the arete on the left hand side of the alcove containing the first group of climbs encountered after coming down the ladder. Directly to the left of

Start Me Up

.

content.description: Scramble up easy blocks to the ledge. It starts in a chimney/corner, then onto a slab with cracks and blocks at the top.
content.protection: 7 bolts to bolted anchor (no quick links)
content.location: Located on the ledge, 15 feet right of Down Time.

content.description: Fun, pocketed face climbing that is somewhat reminiscent of limestone pocket pulling (in terms of pocket climbing, not rock type/quality).  Still needs to clean up a little.  Crux around second to third bolt, can be a little harder if you don't find the right pockets.
content.location: 4 bolt route on a short, heavily pocketed face between Scavenger and Little Girl Suck.  See topo pic on main Rimview page for exact location.

content.description: Climb face to a groove at the top.
content.location: First climb you come to after climbing down the ladder.

content.description: Fun, easy pocket pulling.  A good intro to the area.
content.location: This is the far left route on the Tomo Wall (the second cliff encountered).  See overview topo on main Rimview page for exact location.

content.description: Climb 15’ to a 4’ roof. Pull the roof on pockets to a good ledge. Then continue up the golden head wall to the top.
content.location: Start is on a cool ledge next to a large tree.

climbs.name: Elephant Face
climbs.fa: Matt and Jacinda Thomsen, Aaron Jones

content.description: Cool looking slab, that looks like an elephant head.

Climb short face to a ledge with large blocks. Climb over the small roof to a stance. Step right onto a cool featured slab and climb to the top.

This is the best climb to rap, to climb it and the two climbs to the left.
content.location: Located 50 feet right of the Pumice Cheese.

content.description: Climb the face with a crack in it to a ledge, move off the ledge to a pocketed face with yellow lichen. Climb pockets, and the arete to the anchor.
content.location: Located 10’ to the right of Lovin’ Life.

content.description: Climb the crack to an arete.
content.protection: Bolts to bolted anchor with chains.
content.location: 10’ to the right of Scavenger.

content.description: Start in a chimney and then exit to the face. Climb straight up through blank section.
content.location: Located 15 feet to the right of Pro Choice.
